thag2.39:1.1: Arranging a robe over my shoulder,
thag2.39:1.2: the color of young mango sprouts,
thag2.39:1.3: I entered the village for alms
thag2.39:2.1: But when I dismounted from the elephant,
thag2.39:2.2: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
thag2.39:2.3: I burned with shame, but then I found peace,
thag2.39:2.4: and attained the ending of defilements.
